content: I’m having a hard time figuring out where all the outrage about this incident is coming from? Let’s look at this a different way. If you owned the airline and you overbooked, what would you do? You can’t say you wouldn’t overbook or you wouldn’t be in business. Now, they can limit how often it happens, but let’s just assume it happens to you because it will sooner or later. Now what? You have to get some passengers to get off the plane and give up their seats but nobody wants to do that? What do you do? Apparently, most of you would simply allow the passengers who make the most noise to stay on the plane? You’re going to let whoever throws a temper tantrum to stay on the plane? No, you’re all wrong. Regardless of how loud and crazy this guy was, they did the right thing. HE CAUSED the injury to himself by not being cooperative. They had no choice.
